command.name: Search applications
command.description: Retrieves applications. Fill params to search applications from title, update date, release date, author...

parameter.name: updated_start
parameter.description: Search from date updated. Give date under this format YYYY-MM-DD.

parameter.name: updated_end
parameter.description: Search to date updated. Give date under this format YYYY-MM-DD.

parameter.name: released_start
parameter.description: Search from date release. Give date under this format YYYY-MM-DD.

parameter.name: released_end
parameter.description: Search to date release. Give date under this format YYYY-MM-DD

parameter.name: platforms
parameter.description: IDs list of platforms or platforms titles separated by coma ","

parameter.name: categories
parameter.description: IDs list of categories or categories titles separated by coma ",".

parameter.name: datasets
parameter.description: IDs list of datasets or datasets titles separated by coma ",".

parameter.name: pagelimit
parameter.description: The limit of applications per page.
